EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
DNC 09.
VESSEL, NUMEROUS PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT IN 34-13.00N 017-44.00E
AT 030807Z OCT. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4409, 390 6592 4145,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT. OR JRCC LIBYA,
PHONE: 2189 1034 9739, 2182 1444 9149,
FAX: 2182 1360 6868,
E-MAIL: LCG.OPS.RM@MOD.GOV.LY,
LMRCC.1@MOD.GOV.LY, LMRCC.2@MOD.GOV.LY.
